title: [HOLD for payment 2024-12-11] [$250] Updated multiple selector in workspace settings to be green when objects are selected
issue_repo_steps:
Problem: Users are not sure what to do next when they select multiple categories, tags, etc. when updating the workspace settings. ([thread](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07HPDRELLD/p1732297945702999?thread_ts=1732078999.713569&cid=C07HPDRELLD)) Solution: If someone is selecting multiple objects when updating the workspace, the multiple selector should be green instead of grey. This would apply in any workspace update where multiple objects can be selected so members, taxes, categories, tags, etc. This is what should be green going forward: ![2024-11-22_09-59-13](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/78c1d03b-c1a7-4169-b883-012f499c17b5)
